CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 3 reads: "Special Adoption Project - Mrs. Lorena Bowler is the staff worker for a special adoption project at Family and Children's Service, a Community Chest agency. Working directly under Perry B. Hall, left, executive director of the agency, Mrs. Bowler is coordinating efforts of a citizens' committee to find adoptive homes for eight Negro youngsters, ranging between ages of one and five.  If you can assist, Mrs. Bowler can be reached at Family and Children's Service, 4 Smithfield Street, COurt I-3623. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Perry B. Hall and Lorena Bowler, seated at table in Family and Children's Service Agency, another version
